title: Service disruption on East West Line due to signalling fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东-西部线因信号故障导致服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di Laluan Timur Barat kerana kerosakan isyarat
title_translations.ta: சிக்னலிங் கோளாறு காரணமாக கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train service from #JooKoon towards #Clementi have resumed.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 5 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track circuit fault at #JurongEast. Train svc is available.
[EWL]: Due to a track circuit fault, pls add 10 mins travel time from #JooKoon to #Clementi towards #PasirRis. Train service is available.
[EWL]: Due to a track circuit fault, pls add 20 mins travel time from #JooKoon to #Clementi towards #PasirRis. Train service is available.
[EWL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 10 mins travel time from #JooKoon to #Clementi towards #PasirRis. Train service is available.
